AT.name: Castlevania Aria of Sorrow
AT.description: Im dritten Spiel auf dem Game Boy Advance macht Castlevania einen Zeitsprung in die Zukunft, ins Jahr 2035. Nach einer Sonnenfinsternis erwacht der neue Held Soma Cruz im Innern einer rätselhaften Burg. Finde einen Weg durch die verschlungenen Labyrinthe der Burg und stelle dich auf Schritt und Tritt gefährlichen Monstern. Mit Somas taktischem Seelensystem sammelst du die Seelen deiner Gegner, erlernst ihre Fähigkeiten und kannst sie ausrüsten, um neue Kräfte zu aktivieren – insgesamt gibt es über 100. Doch sei auf der Hut! Du musst entkommen, bevor das Böse dich verschlingt. Wenn du die Schrecken der Burg überlebt hast, warten weitere Modi und Herausforderungen auf dich.

AU.name: Castlevania Aria of Sorrow
AU.description: In its third Game Boy Advance instalment, Castlevania jumps into the future, to the year 2035. After a solar eclipse, new hero Soma Cruz awakens inside a mysterious castle. You must navigate the castle's labyrinths while confronting perilous monsters at every turn. Use Soma’s Tactical Soul system to collect souls of enemies to learn their abilities, and equip them to activate new powers – more than 100 in total. But beware: you must escape before evil consumes you. Once you've survived the horrors of the castle, extra modes and challenges await!

BG.name: Castlevania Aria of Sorrow
BG.description: In its third Game Boy Advance instalment, Castlevania jumps into the future, to the year 2035. After a solar eclipse, new hero Soma Cruz awakens inside a mysterious castle. But beware: you must escape before evil consumes you. Once you've survived the horrors of the castle, extra modes and challenges await!

BE.name: Castlevania Aria of Sorrow
BE.description: Dans ce troisième épisode sur Game Boy Advance, Castlevania fait un saut dans le futur, en 2035. Après une éclipse solaire, le nouveau héros, Soma Cruz, se réveille dans un mystérieux château. Traversez les labyrinthes du château en affrontant les nombreux monstres et dangers qui vous attendent à chaque détour. Apprenez les techniques de vos ennemis en ramassant leurs âmes avec le nouveau système Tactical Soul de Samo, puis équipez-vous en pour activer de nouveaux pouvoirs : il y en a plus de 100 au total. Mais prenez garde : vous devrez vous échapper avant que le Mal ne vous consume. Une fois que vous aurez survécu aux horreurs du château, des modes et des défis supplémentaires vous attendront !

ES.name: Castlevania Aria of Sorrow
ES.description: La tercera entrega de Castlevania para Game Boy Advance nos transporta al futuro, concretamente al año 2035. Soma Cruz, el nuevo héroe de la saga, se despierta en un misterioso castillo tras un eclipse solar. Guíalo por los laberintos del edificio y deshazte de los monstruos que acechan en cada esquina. Utiliza el sistema del Alma Táctica para absorber las almas de tus enemigos y adquirir sus habilidades, y equípate con ellas para activar poderes nuevos: hay más de 100 en total. Debes escapar antes de que el mal te consuma, ¡así que no te entretengas! Varios modos y desafíos nuevos te esperan si sobrevives a los horrores del castillo.

IT.name: Castlevania Aria of Sorrow
IT.description: Castlevania ti teletrasporta nel futuro nel terzo capitolo per Game Boy Advance. È il 2035 e dopo un'eclissi di sole il nuovo eroe della saga Soma Cruz si risveglia in un misterioso castello infestato da malefiche creature nascoste in ogni angolo delle sue labirintiche stanze. Usa il Tactical Soul, lo speciale potere di Soma di controllare le anime dei nemici per assorbirne le abilità e usarle a proprio vantaggio: ce ne sono più di 100. Ma fai attenzione, fuggi dal male prima che ti consumi! Inoltre, se riuscirai a sopravvivere agli orrori del castello, scoprirai nuove modalità di gioco e sfide da affrontare.

NL.name: Castlevania Aria of Sorrow
NL.description: In deze derde Castlevania-game voor de Game Boy Advance gaan we vooruit in de tijd. We schrijven 2035. Na een zonsverduistering ontwaakt Soma Cruz - de nieuwe held - in een mysterieus kasteel. Ontdek en ontrafel de labyrinten terwijl je de monsters die je tegenkomt verslaat. Soma kan de zielen van verslagen vijanden verzamelen en zo nieuwe vaardigheden gebruiken. Er zijn er in totaal meer dan 100. Verlaat het kasteel voordat je wordt verslonden door het kwaad dat er loert. Extra spelstanden en uitdagingen komen beschikbaar zodra je het spel hebt uitgespeeld.

NZ.name: Castlevania Aria of Sorrow
NZ.description: In its third Game Boy Advance instalment, Castlevania jumps into the future, to the year 2035. After a solar eclipse, new hero Soma Cruz awakens inside a mysterious castle. You must navigate the castle's labyrinths while confronting perilous monsters at every turn. Use Soma’s Tactical Soul system to collect souls of enemies to learn their abilities, and equip them to activate new powers – more than 100 in total. But beware: you must escape before evil consumes you. Once you've survived the horrors of the castle, extra modes and challenges await!

PL.name: Castlevania Aria of Sorrow
PL.description: In its third Game Boy Advance instalment, Castlevania jumps into the future, to the year 2035. After a solar eclipse, new hero Soma Cruz awakens inside a mysterious castle. You must navigate the castle's labyrinths while confronting perilous monsters at every turn. Use Soma’s Tactical Soul system to collect souls of enemies to learn their abilities, and equip them to activate new powers – more than 100 in total. But beware: you must escape before evil consumes you. Once you've survived the horrors of the castle, extra modes and challenges await!

PT.name: Castlevania Aria of Sorrow
PT.description: Neste terceiro jogo para a Game Boy Advance, Castlevania avança para o futuro, para o ano de 2035. Após um eclipse solar, o novo herói, Soma Cruz, desperta dentro de um misterioso castelo. Percorre os labirintos do castelo enquanto enfrentas monstros perigosos a cada esquina. Utiliza o Tactical Soul, o poder especial de Soma para recolher as almas dos inimigos, aprendendo assim as suas habilidades e equipa-os para ativares mais de 100 novos poderes. Mas não tem cuidado! Tens de escapar antes que o mal te destrua. Se conseguires sobreviver aos horrores do castelo, descobrirás modos de jogo extra e novos desafios!

RU.name: Castlevania Aria of Sorrow
RU.description: В третьей версии для Game Boy Advance игра Castlevania переносит нас в будущее. 2035 год. Полное солнечное затмение. Новый герой саги по имени Soma Cruz приходит в сознание в таинственном замке. Ему предстоит найти выход из запутанных лабиринтов замка, где на каждом повороте его поджидают опасные монстры. Используйте систему Tactical Soul, чтобы собирать души побежденных врагов, приобретать их навыки и активировать новые возможности — более ста в общей сложности. Помните: вам необходимо выбраться из замка до того, как силы зла настигнут вас! А за пределами замка вас ждут новые уровни и испытания.

SE.name: Castlevania Aria of Sorrow
SE.description: In its third Game Boy Advance instalment, Castlevania jumps into the future, to the year 2035. After a solar eclipse, new hero Soma Cruz awakens inside a mysterious castle.
